original_text: Was it not necessary that the Christ should suffer these things and enter into his glory?”
korean_text: 그리스도가 이런 고난을 받고 자기의 영광에 들어가야 할 것이 아니냐 하시고

sentences.original_text: Was it not necessary that the Christ should suffer these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 이런 고난을 받아야만 했던 것이 마땅하지 않았느냐
